gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 550 Series (POLARIS12 / DRM 3.23.0 / 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes: Only issue encountered was creation of a player profile in the setup window.  Needed to move windows to continue through the save dialog.  Played at 1280x1024.  Played through first level (Hoth speeder), and part of second (inside the base).  No issues noticed for gameplay.  Played at full screen.
title: STAR WARS™ SHADOWS OF THE EMPIRE™
